text: They ’ re living out their happily ever after. Teen Mom OG stars Catelynn Lowell and Tyler Baltierra are celebrating 12 years together, and Baltierra commemorated the anniversary on Saturday, July 15, with a sweet Instagram post. Alongside a split collage featuring a recent photo and a throwback photo of the couple, the doting husband wrote, “ I can ’ t believe that today marks 12 years together with you @ catelynnmtv, babe you literally are the greatest gift this live has given me! We were only kids when we fell in love, but we were kids who knew what we wanted out of life & who we wanted to get it with. Not a lot of people get that opportunity or blessing at such a young age.
